subject: Vulgar Voices
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
I know that there are many spirits who are vulgar, malicious, liars, troublemakers, etc.  Last night I did my first ghost box session alone, (my second session overall - or third if I count the synth voice box session).  During the session, I was feeling a little bit self-conscious and discouraged, not sure if it would work for me alone, etc. so my mood was a little down, maybe negative.... also I'm a relatively young female (28).  I'm wondering if its due to those two factors that I received - upon going back to listen to the recorded session (I'll try to post files up later for confirmation)... a series of unwelcoming and vulgar messages...  toward the beginning of the session someone said "you're too young" and then a while into it I got "h* cheats, hit me hit me hit me hit me"... and then toward the end of the session I got "a**hole".  (Frank, please let me know if I've crossed the line as far as posting up vulgar words on this group - not sure how else to discuss my session, lol... and I do apologize)

So here's the thing, I can alter my attitude, to be more positive, but I can't alter my age and gender...  so any other females get vulgar messages like this? And what can I do about it?  What should I say?  I really have no desire to continue with these sessions if this is how I get treated...  I guess I was an easy target, just starting out with the ghost box, and not being a confident type, I'm a shy, timid, walk-all-over-me type too often.... how do I "administer discipline" in this situation?  Does it work to just tell them to please stop it, or that you're not welcome if you don't behave, etc?  Or does that only egg them on further?  Help!
